Others: Quinten Grimes had 26 points, nine rebounds, and six assists to lead the Dallas Mavericks in their 118-97 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers.
P.J. Washington shot 9 for 14 and finished with 22 points and eight rebounds for the Mavs.
The Mavericks ended their five-game losing streak without their top scorers Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving.
Anthony Davis led the Lakers with 21 points and 12 rebounds, while LeBron James added 18 points, 10 rebounds, and eight assists.
